title: High ping issues
body:
From Melbourne, Australia.
My ISP is find, internet does tend to cut out here and there but nothing too serious.
Speedtest.net says I have 10ms of ping, in game previous a month or two ago i was experiencing a base ping of 28-29ms.
In the last month and even more so now, I am constantly rubber-banding between 28ms and 1400ms, with these spikes occuring roughly once every 20-30 seconds.
The game is unplayable in this state and it really does suck :(
No environmental factors, today is a lovely day outside, ISP is fine, connection is stable for all other apps.

Is this a common problem for anyone atm, and if so is there a way to fix this?

Thanks for any support!

replies.body:
Big fluctuations in latency are generally caused by changes in your ISP routing to the server. Since each service, website, and game server is located in different geolocations, it's entirely possible to have great latency to one server while having high latency to another. Sometimes local configurations can affect your latency as well, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are optimized for League.

Let me know if you notice any changes after working through that guide.
